plot: George Daynor gives a tour of his depression-era wonder, the Palace of Depression, a palace built of out discarded junk that became a tourist attraction until it was torn down in 1969.
title: The Fantastic Palace
plot_es: George Daynor gives a tour of his depression-era wonder, the Palace of Depression, a palace built of out discarded junk that became a tourist attraction until it was torn down in 1969.
plot_en: George Daynor gives a tour of his depression-era wonder, the Palace of Depression, a palace built of out discarded junk that became a tourist attraction until it was torn down in 1969.
